title: The Monkey and the crab
brief_description: This film is a Japanese variation of the work fable of the grasshopper-ant type. Animated puppets are used to portray the industrious farmer crab bluffed out of his rice crop by a lazy monkey. However, crab and his friends are able to gain their revenge. Suitable for upper primary level.
